org.usgs.manifold.packet.earthworm

Class HeartBeatPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usgs.manifold.packet.earthworm.EarthwormPacket
      • org.usgs.manifold.packet.earthworm.HeartBeatPacket

  • public class HeartBeatPacket
extends EarthwormPacket
    Class to represent an earthworm heartbeat packet. These are used to make the earthworm connection happy.
